section.p: The configsettings_controller.properties file located in <install_pack_dir>/databases/app_db contains the configuration settings for the TPS5 service controller. This configuration is used for the initial setup and stored in the APP database.

section.title: CONTROLLER_ID
section.p: The identifier of the service controller.

section.title: BSS_ORGANIZATION_ID
section.p: The ID of the organization in which is responsible for the service controller. The organization must have the technology provider role.

section.title: BSS_USER_KEY
section.p: The user key for accessing .
Replace <userKey> with the user key which you receive with the confirmation email for your user account.
The user specified here must have the technology manager role in and belong to the organization specified in the BSS_ORGANIZATION_ID setting.
It is recommended that the user account is used only for carrying out actions on behalf of the service controller in .

section.title: BSS_USER_ID
section.p: The identifier of the user specified in BSS_USER_KEY for accessing .
Replace <userId> with the user ID.

section.title: BSS_USER_PWD
section.p: The password of the user specified in BSS_USER_KEY for accessing .
Replace <password> with the plain text password. The password is encrypted when it is stored in the database.

section.title: IAAS_API_LOCALE
section.p: The locale to be used for communicating with TPS5.
Replace <locale> with the identifier of the desired locale, for example, en or ja.

section.title: IAAS_API_URI
section.p: The URL of the TPS5 API.
Replace <TPS5 server> and <port> with the host name and port of your TPS5 server.

section.title: IAAS_API_KEYSTORE_TYPE
section.p: The type of certificate used for accessing the TPS5 API.
Replace <type> with the identifier of the certificate type, for example, pkcs12.

section.title: IAAS_API_KEYSTORE_PASS
section.p: The password required for accessing the keystore used by the TPS5 API.
Replace <password> with the plain text password defined when creating the certificate for the user who accesses TPS5. The password is encrypted when it is stored in the database.

section.title: IAAS_API_KEYSTORE
section.p: The path to the certificate file.
Replace <path> with the URL leading to the certificate file on the application server.
